description:
BDD is one of the not so well known testing techniques used in Software
development to ensure every actor involved (Business, Devs, Ops, SecOps,
...) build understanding on :

-  Why we build something; for WHO?
-  WHAT is built?
-  WHEN the thing we built is considered done?

My Talk is about using BDD in Python with Behave Framework; to ensure
that your development brings the right value your the Business. We will
start as a beginner and try to achieve the Expert level.
title: Learn BDD in Python with Behave
